_sText:
***** DE_INFERNO_BIS_V1 *****

Bomb/defuse map
Author : Piou~Stick
Email : fab.py@wanadoo.fr
Date of creation : September 2005

This is my third map.
1st one: awp_source_map
2nd one: awp_source_lake

The action takes place in another little sunny village. There are two bomb sites in this map which are two squares: "plaza del Mariucci" and "plaza del Sol". Counter-terrorists must prevent the terrorists from destroying either one of the bomb targets.
There are three main ways to reach the bomb sites. I add sewers to the original map de_inferno which link the two targets and the terrorists respawn.

Max players : 44 (22 terrorists and 22 counter-terrorists :)

Original source map by Turtle Rock Studios.
Original map by Chris Auty (Barney).

Pleaze do not modify these files and mail me if you have some questions or suggestions.

This map is dedicated to my friend Dimitri MARIEY.

I hope you will enjoy this map!

Piou
